resources.string:
Tutorial: 
 -Press play button to play the Youtube playlist. 
 -Move forward and backward in the playlist accordingly. 
 
 To fullscreen: 
 -Tap fullscreen on Youtube Widget. 
 -Screen will be rotated, play the video again. 
 -Press fullscreen again. 
 
 Information: 
 1st Video - SDLC 
 2nd Video - Project Management and Identification 
 3rd Video - Feasibility Analysis
